ygData.subject: RE: RE: Cleric/Bard armor quests
ygData.msgSnippet: In the patch news there is mention of a system they have where you have to kill some things to make certain other things spawn.  I know that is pretty vague
ygData.messageBody:
In the patch news there is mention of a system they have where you have to
kill some things to make certain other things spawn. I know that is pretty
vague and knowing Verant it might be pretty obtuse. But I bet there is a
'trick' to it and someone will discover it. And then for all of 3 days he
will be the only one with the stuff. As soon as he tells his best friend...
3days later lots will have and every spoiler site will have details.

Just a guess,

Sylly

for Zahal - try killing all the ghouls and undead - like lots and lots and
lots - just guessing but they did say you have to kill stuff...

-----Original Message-----
From: Andrew Simpson [mailto:hornsfan@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 30, 1999 10:19 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Cleric/Bard armor quests

From: "Andrew Simpson" <hornsfan@...>


he's
given up on the bracers because that stupid ghoul in NK
won't spawn either.
